value.title: 5 reasons Azure Databricks is best for Hadoop workloads
value.excerpt: Due to the complexity, high cost of operations, and unscalable infrastructure, on-premises Hadoop platforms have often not delivered on their initial promises to impact business value. As a result, many enterprises are now seeking to modernize their Hadoop platforms to cloud data platforms.

value.title: GPU Market Size | Industry Forecast Report To 2024
value.excerpt: GPU Market is set to exceed USD 80 billion by 2024; according to a new research report by Global Market Insights, Inc. Ever increasing demand for advanced graphics processing across several sectors is majorly driving the graphics processing unit (GPU) market trends.

value.title: Will 2022 Be The Year of Machine Learning in Healthcare?
